questions.question: If the alphabet series is written in reverse order, which letter would be 5th from the right?
questions.explanation: Reverse alphabet: Z Y X W V U T... So, V is the 5th letter from right.

questions.question: Which letter is 3rd to the left of the letter which is 6th from right end of the alphabet?
questions.explanation: 6th from right: U (Z,Y,X,W,V,U). 3rd to the left of U: R (U,T,S,R)

questions.question: How many letters are there between K and P in the English alphabet?
questions.explanation: Between K and P are L, M, N, O (4 letters)

questions.question: If every alternate letter starting from B is written in alphabetical order, what letter would be 4th?
questions.explanation: Alternate letters from B: B,D,F,H,J... So H is the 4th letter

questions.question: Which letter would be midpoint between F and T in the alphabet?
questions.explanation: F to T: F,G,H,I,J,K,L,M,N,O,P,Q,R,S,T (total 15 letters, 7 letters on each side of M)
